system.effect: When a character is hit by this weapon, regardless of whether they take damage, they must make -10*X Toughness Test or suffer 2d10 nonpermenant Toughness Damage.

description.value: When a character is hit by this weapon, regardless of whether they take damage, they must make -10*X Toughness Test or suffer 2d10 nonpermenant Toughness Damage.
